content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment, Mr. Li. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay in Munich and I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euros per month. Thank you.

What is the monthly rental price for my apartment?

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I will pay the rent on time and I will not cause any damage to the apartment.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment, Mr. Li. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. I am looking for a tenant who is reliable and responsible, and I am happy to hear that you are a student and will pay the rent on time.

Considering your budget of 700 Euros per month, I am willing to agree to a rental price of 650 Euros per month. This price reflects the value of the apartment and the location, and I believe it is a fair and reasonable price. If you are willing to accept this price, I would be happy to move forward with the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month.

Thank you very much for your consideration. I look forward to moving into your apartment.

I will pay the rent on time and I will not cause any damage to the apartment.

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible.

Thank you again for your consideration.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
You're welcome, Mr. Li. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 650 Euros per month. I appreciate your understanding and commitment to paying the rent on time and taking care of the apartment.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental process. I'm looking forward to having you as my tenant and wish you a successful stay in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine
